00026 // FindEdgeInfo()
00027 //
00028 // find the edge info for these two indices
00029 //
00030 NvEdgeInfo * NvStripifier::FindEdgeInfo( NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos, int v0, int v1 ){
00031         
00032         // we can get to it through either array
00033         // because the edge infos have a v0 and v1
00034         // and there is no order except how it was
00035         // first created.
00036         NvEdgeInfo *infoIter = edgeInfos[ v0 ];
00037         while ( infoIter != NULL ){
00038                 if ( infoIter->m_v0 == v0 ){
00039                         if ( infoIter->m_v1 == v1 )
00040                                 return infoIter;
00041                         else
00042                                 infoIter = infoIter->m_nextV0;
00043                 }
00044                 else {
00045                         assert( infoIter->m_v1 == v0 );
00046                         if ( infoIter->m_v0 == v1 )
00047                                 return infoIter;
00048                         else
00049                                 infoIter = infoIter->m_nextV1;
00050                 }
00051         }
00052         return NULL;
00053 }

00057 // FindOtherFace
00058 //
00059 // find the other face sharing these vertices
00060 // exactly like the edge info above
00061 //
00062 NvFaceInfo * NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos, int v0, int v1, NvFaceInfo *faceInfo ){
00063         NvEdgeInfo *edgeInfo = FindEdgeInfo( edgeInfos, v0, v1 );
00064 
00065         if( ( edgeInfo == NULL ) && ( v0 == v1 ) )
00066         {
00067                 //we've hit a degenerate
00068                 return NULL;
00069         }
00070 
00071         assert( edgeInfo != NULL );
00072         return ( edgeInfo->m_face0 == faceInfo ? edgeInfo->m_face1 : edgeInfo->m_face0 );
00073 }

00075 
00076 bool NvStripifier::AlreadyExists( NvFaceInfo* faceInfo, NvFaceInfoVec& faceInfos )
00077 {
00078         for( int i = 0; i < faceInfos.size(); ++i )
00079         {
00080                 if( ( faceInfos[ i ]->m_v0 == faceInfo->m_v0 ) &&
00081                         ( faceInfos[ i ]->m_v1 == faceInfo->m_v1 ) &&
00082                         ( faceInfos[ i ]->m_v2 == faceInfo->m_v2 ) )
00083                         return true;
00084         }
00085 
00086         return false;
00087 }

00090 // BuildStripifyInfo()
00091 //
00092 // Builds the list of all face and edge infos
00093 //
00094 void NvStripifier::BuildStripifyInfo( NvFaceInfoVec &faceInfos, NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos,
00095                                                                          const unsigned short maxIndex )
00096 {
00097         // reserve space for the face infos, but do not resize them.
00098         int numIndices = indices.size();
00099         faceInfos.reserve( numIndices / 3 );
00100         
00101         // we actually resize the edge infos, so we must initialize to NULL
00102         edgeInfos.resize( maxIndex + 1 );
00103         int i = 0;
00104         for ( ; i < maxIndex + 1; i++ )
00105                 edgeInfos[ i ] = NULL;
00106         
00107         // iterate through the triangles of the triangle list
00108         int numTriangles = numIndices / 3;
00109         int index        = 0;
00110         bool bFaceUpdated[ 3 ];
00111 
00112         for ( i = 0; i < numTriangles; i++ )
00113         {       
00114                 bool bMightAlreadyExist = true;
00115                 bFaceUpdated[ 0 ] = false;
00116                 bFaceUpdated[ 1 ] = false;
00117                 bFaceUpdated[ 2 ] = false;
00118 
00119                 // grab the indices
00120                 int v0 = indices[ index++ ];
00121                 int v1 = indices[ index++ ];
00122                 int v2 = indices[ index++ ];
00123 
00124                 //we disregard degenerates
00125                 if( IsDegenerate( v0, v1, v2 ) )
00126                         continue;
00127                 
00128                 // create the face info and add it to the list of faces, but only if this exact face doesn't already 
00129                 //  exist in the list
00130                 NvFaceInfo *faceInfo = new NvFaceInfo( v0, v1, v2 );
00131                 
00132                 // grab the edge infos, creating them if they do not already exist
00133                 NvEdgeInfo *edgeInfo01 = FindEdgeInfo( edgeInfos, v0, v1 );
00134                 if ( edgeInfo01 == NULL )
00135                 {
00136                         //since one of it's edges isn't in the edge data structure, it can't already exist in the face structure
00137                         bMightAlreadyExist = false;
00138 
00139                         // create the info
00140                         edgeInfo01 = new NvEdgeInfo( v0, v1 );
00141                         
00142                         // update the linked list on both 
00143                         edgeInfo01->m_nextV0 = edgeInfos[ v0 ];
00144                         edgeInfo01->m_nextV1 = edgeInfos[ v1 ];
00145                         edgeInfos[ v0 ] = edgeInfo01;
00146                         edgeInfos[ v1 ] = edgeInfo01;
00147                         
00148                         // set face 0
00149                         edgeInfo01->m_face0 = faceInfo;
00150                 }
00151                 else 
00152                 {
00153                         if ( edgeInfo01->m_face1 != NULL )
00154                         {
00155                                 printf( "BuildStripifyInfo: > 2 triangles on an edge... uncertain consequences\n" );
00156                         }
00157                         else
00158                         {
00159                                 edgeInfo01->m_face1 = faceInfo;
00160                                 bFaceUpdated[ 0 ] = true;
00161                         }
00162                 }
00163                 
00164                 // grab the edge infos, creating them if they do not already exist
00165                 NvEdgeInfo *edgeInfo12 = FindEdgeInfo( edgeInfos, v1, v2 );
00166                 if ( edgeInfo12 == NULL )
00167                 {
00168                         bMightAlreadyExist = false;
00169                         
00170                         // create the info
00171                         edgeInfo12 = new NvEdgeInfo( v1, v2 );
00172                         
00173                         // update the linked list on both 
00174                         edgeInfo12->m_nextV0 = edgeInfos[ v1 ];
00175                         edgeInfo12->m_nextV1 = edgeInfos[ v2 ];
00176                         edgeInfos[ v1 ] = edgeInfo12;
00177                         edgeInfos[ v2 ] = edgeInfo12;
00178                         
00179                         // set face 0
00180                         edgeInfo12->m_face0 = faceInfo;
00181                 }
00182                 else 
00183                 {
00184                         if ( edgeInfo12->m_face1 != NULL )
00185                         {
00186                                 printf( "BuildStripifyInfo: > 2 triangles on an edge... uncertain consequences\n" );
00187                         }
00188                         else
00189                         {
00190                                 edgeInfo12->m_face1 = faceInfo;
00191                                 bFaceUpdated[ 1 ] = true;
00192                         }
00193                 }
00194                 
00195                 // grab the edge infos, creating them if they do not already exist
00196                 NvEdgeInfo *edgeInfo20 = FindEdgeInfo( edgeInfos, v2, v0 );
00197                 if ( edgeInfo20 == NULL )
00198                 {
00199                         bMightAlreadyExist = false;
00200 
00201                         // create the info
00202                         edgeInfo20 = new NvEdgeInfo( v2, v0 );
00203                         
00204                         // update the linked list on both 
00205                         edgeInfo20->m_nextV0 = edgeInfos[ v2 ];
00206                         edgeInfo20->m_nextV1 = edgeInfos[ v0 ];
00207                         edgeInfos[ v2 ] = edgeInfo20;
00208                         edgeInfos[ v0 ] = edgeInfo20;
00209                         
00210                         // set face 0
00211                         edgeInfo20->m_face0 = faceInfo;
00212                 }
00213                 else 
00214                 {
00215                         if ( edgeInfo20->m_face1 != NULL )
00216                         {
00217                                 printf( "BuildStripifyInfo: > 2 triangles on an edge... uncertain consequences\n" );
00218                         }
00219                         else
00220                         {
00221                                 edgeInfo20->m_face1 = faceInfo;
00222                                 bFaceUpdated[ 2 ] = true;
00223                         }
00224                 }
00225 
00226                 if( bMightAlreadyExist )
00227                 {
00228                         if( !AlreadyExists( faceInfo, faceInfos ) )
00229                                 faceInfos.push_back( faceInfo );
00230                         else
00231                         {
00232                                 delete faceInfo;
00233 
00234                                 //cleanup pointers that point to this deleted face
00235                                 if( bFaceUpdated[ 0 ] )
00236                                         edgeInfo01->m_face1 = NULL;
00237                                 if( bFaceUpdated[ 1 ] )
00238                                         edgeInfo12->m_face1 = NULL;
00239                                 if( bFaceUpdated[ 2 ] )
00240                                         edgeInfo20->m_face1 = NULL;
00241                         }
00242                 }
00243                 else
00244                 {
00245                         faceInfos.push_back( faceInfo );
00246                 }
00247 
00248         }
00249 }

00253 // FindStartPoint()
00254 //
00255 // Finds a good starting point, namely one which has only one neighbor
00256 //
00257 int NvStripifier::FindStartPoint( NvFaceInfoVec &faceInfos, NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos )
00258 {
00259         int bestCtr = -1;
00260         int bestIndex = -1;
00261 
00262         for( int i = 0; i < faceInfos.size(); i++ )
00263         {
00264                 int ctr = 0;
00265                 
00266                 if( FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, faceInfos[ i ]->m_v0, faceInfos[ i ]->m_v1, faceInfos[ i ] ) == NULL )
00267                         ctr++;
00268                 if( FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, faceInfos[ i ]->m_v1, faceInfos[ i ]->m_v2, faceInfos[ i ] ) == NULL )
00269                         ctr++;
00270                 if( FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, faceInfos[ i ]->m_v2, faceInfos[ i ]->m_v0, faceInfos[ i ] ) == NULL )
00271                         ctr++;
00272                 if( ctr > bestCtr )
00273                 {
00274                         bestCtr = ctr;
00275                         bestIndex = i;
00276                         //return i;
00277                 }
00278         }
00279         //return -1;
00280         
00281         if( bestCtr == 0 )
00282                 return -1;
00283         else
00284                 return bestIndex;
00285 }

00289 // FindGoodResetPoint()
00290 //  
00291 // A good reset point is one near other commited areas so that
00292 // we know that when we've made the longest strips its because
00293 // we're stripifying in the same general orientation.
00294 //
00295 NvFaceInfo* NvStripifier::FindGoodResetPoint( NvFaceInfoVec &faceInfos, NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos ){
00296         // we hop into different areas of the mesh to try to get
00297         // other large open spans done.  Areas of small strips can
00298         // just be left to triangle lists added at the end.
00299         NvFaceInfo *result = NULL;
00300         
00301         if( result == NULL )
00302         {
00303                 int numFaces   = faceInfos.size();
00304                 int startPoint;
00305                 if( bFirstTimeResetPoint )
00306                 {
00307                         //first time, find a face with few neighbors ( look for an edge of the mesh )
00308                         startPoint = FindStartPoint( faceInfos, edgeInfos );
00309                         bFirstTimeResetPoint = false;
00310                 }
00311                 else
00312                         startPoint = ( int )( ( ( float ) numFaces - 1 ) * meshJump );
00313                 
00314                 if( startPoint == -1 )
00315                 {
00316                         startPoint = ( int )( ( ( float ) numFaces - 1 ) * meshJump );
00317                         
00318                         //meshJump += 0.1f;
00319                         //if ( meshJump > 1.0f )
00320                         //      meshJump = .05f;
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 int i = startPoint;
00324                 do {
00325                         
00326                         // if this guy isn't visited, try him
00327                         if ( faceInfos[ i ]->m_stripId < 0 ){
00328                                 result = faceInfos[ i ];
00329                                 break;
00330                         }
00331                         
00332                         // update the index and clamp to 0-( numFaces-1 )
00333                         if ( ++i >= numFaces )
00334                                 i = 0;
00335                         
00336                 } while ( i != startPoint );
00337                 
00338                 // update the meshJump
00339                 meshJump += 0.1f;
00340                 if ( meshJump > 1.0f )
00341                         meshJump = .05f;
00342         }
00343         
00344         // return the best face we found
00345         return result;
00346 }

00350 // GetUniqueVertexInB()
00351 //
00352 // Returns the vertex unique to faceB
00353 //
00354 int NvStripifier::GetUniqueVertexInB( NvFaceInfo *faceA, NvFaceInfo *faceB ){
00355         
00356         int facev0 = faceB->m_v0;
00357         if ( facev0 != faceA->m_v0 &&
00358                 facev0 != faceA->m_v1 &&
00359                 facev0 != faceA->m_v2 )
00360                 return facev0;
00361         
00362         int facev1 = faceB->m_v1;
00363         if ( facev1 != faceA->m_v0 &&
00364                 facev1 != faceA->m_v1 &&
00365                 facev1 != faceA->m_v2 )
00366                 return facev1;
00367         
00368         int facev2 = faceB->m_v2;
00369         if ( facev2 != faceA->m_v0 &&
00370                 facev2 != faceA->m_v1 &&
00371                 facev2 != faceA->m_v2 )
00372                 return facev2;
00373         
00374         // nothing is different
00375         return -1;
00376 }

00380 // GetSharedVertices()
00381 //
00382 // Returns the ( at most ) two vertices shared between the two faces
00383 //
00384 void NvStripifier::GetSharedVertices( NvFaceInfo *faceA, NvFaceInfo *faceB, int* vertex0, int* vertex1 )
00385 {
00386         *vertex0 = -1;
00387         *vertex1 = -1;
00388 
00389         int facev0 = faceB->m_v0;
00390         if ( facev0 == faceA->m_v0 ||
00391                 facev0 == faceA->m_v1 ||
00392                 facev0 == faceA->m_v2 )
00393         {
00394                 if( *vertex0 == -1 )
00395                         *vertex0 = facev0;
00396                 else
00397                 {
00398                         *vertex1 = facev0;
00399                         return;
00400                 }
00401         }
00402         
00403         int facev1 = faceB->m_v1;
00404         if ( facev1 == faceA->m_v0 ||
00405                 facev1 == faceA->m_v1 ||
00406                 facev1 == faceA->m_v2 )
00407         {
00408                 if( *vertex0 == -1 )
00409                         *vertex0 = facev1;
00410                 else
00411                 {
00412                         *vertex1 = facev1;
00413                         return;
00414                 }
00415         }       
00416 
00417         int facev2 = faceB->m_v2;
00418         if ( facev2 == faceA->m_v0 ||
00419                 facev2 == faceA->m_v1 ||
00420                 facev2 == faceA->m_v2 )
00421         {
00422                 if( *vertex0 == -1 )
00423                         *vertex0 = facev2;
00424                 else
00425                 {
00426                         *vertex1 = facev2;
00427                         return;
00428                 }
00429         }
00430 
00431 }

00435 // GetNextIndex()
00436 //
00437 // Returns vertex of the input face which is "next" in the input index list
00438 //
00439 inline int NvStripifier::GetNextIndex( const WordVec &indices, NvFaceInfo *face ){
00440         
00441         int numIndices = indices.size();
00442         assert( numIndices >= 2 );
00443         
00444         int v0  = indices[ numIndices-2 ];
00445         int v1  = indices[ numIndices-1 ];
00446         
00447         int fv0 = face->m_v0;
00448         int fv1 = face->m_v1;
00449         int fv2 = face->m_v2;
00450         
00451         if ( fv0 != v0 && fv0 != v1 ){
00452                 if ( ( fv1 != v0 && fv1 != v1 ) || ( fv2 != v0 && fv2 != v1 ) ){
00453                         printf( "GetNextIndex: Triangle doesn't have all of its vertices\n" );
00454                         printf( "GetNextIndex: Duplicate triangle probably got us derailed\n" );
00455                 }
00456                 return fv0;
00457         }
00458         if ( fv1 != v0 && fv1 != v1 ){
00459                 if ( ( fv0 != v0 && fv0 != v1 ) || ( fv2 != v0 && fv2 != v1 ) ){
00460                         printf( "GetNextIndex: Triangle doesn't have all of its vertices\n" );
00461                         printf( "GetNextIndex: Duplicate triangle probably got us derailed\n" );
00462                 }
00463                 return fv1;
00464         }
00465         if ( fv2 != v0 && fv2 != v1 ){
00466                 if ( ( fv0 != v0 && fv0 != v1 ) || ( fv1 != v0 && fv1 != v1 ) ){
00467                         printf( "GetNextIndex: Triangle doesn't have all of its vertices\n" );
00468                         printf( "GetNextIndex: Duplicate triangle probably got us derailed\n" );
00469                 }
00470                 return fv2;
00471         }
00472         
00473         // shouldn't get here, but let's try and fail gracefully
00474         if( ( fv0 == fv1 ) || ( fv0 == fv2 ) )
00475                 return fv0;
00476         else if( ( fv1 == fv0 ) || ( fv1 == fv2 ) )
00477                 return fv1;
00478         else if( ( fv2 == fv0 ) || ( fv2 == fv1 ) )
00479                 return fv2;
00480         else
00481                 return -1;
00482 }

00486 // IsMarked()
00487 //
00488 // If either the faceInfo has a real strip index because it is
00489 // already assign to a committed strip OR it is assigned in an
00490 // experiment and the experiment index is the one we are building
00491 // for, then it is marked and unavailable
00492 inline bool NvStripInfo::IsMarked( NvFaceInfo *faceInfo ){
00493         return ( faceInfo->m_stripId >= 0 ) || ( IsExperiment() && faceInfo->m_experimentId == m_experimentId );
00494 }

00496 
00498 // MarkTriangle()
00499 //
00500 // Marks the face with the current strip ID
00501 //
00502 inline void NvStripInfo::MarkTriangle( NvFaceInfo *faceInfo ){
00503         assert( !IsMarked( faceInfo ) );
00504         if ( IsExperiment() ){
00505                 faceInfo->m_experimentId = m_experimentId;
00506                 faceInfo->m_testStripId  = m_stripId;
00507     }
00508         else{
00509                 assert( faceInfo->m_stripId == -1 );
00510                 faceInfo->m_experimentId = -1;
00511                 faceInfo->m_stripId      = m_stripId;
00512         }
00513 }

00515 
00516 bool NvStripInfo::Unique( NvFaceInfoVec& faceVec, NvFaceInfo* face )
00517 {
00518         bool bv0, bv1, bv2; //bools to indicate whether a vertex is in the faceVec or not
00519         bv0 = bv1 = bv2 = false;
00520 
00521         for( int i = 0; i < faceVec.size(); i++ )
00522         {
00523                 if( !bv0 )
00524                 {
00525                         if( ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v0 == face->m_v0 ) || 
00526                                 ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v1 == face->m_v0 ) ||
00527                                 ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v2 == face->m_v0 ) )
00528                                 bv0 = true;
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 if( !bv1 )
00532                 {
00533                         if( ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v0 == face->m_v1 ) || 
00534                                 ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v1 == face->m_v1 ) ||
00535                                 ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v2 == face->m_v1 ) )
00536                                 bv1 = true;
00537                 }
00538 
00539                 if( !bv2 )
00540                 {
00541                         if( ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v0 == face->m_v2 ) || 
00542                                 ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v1 == face->m_v2 ) ||
00543                                 ( faceVec[ i ]->m_v2 == face->m_v2 ) )
00544                                 bv2 = true;
00545                 }
00546 
00547                 //the face is not unique, all it's vertices exist in the face vector
00548                 if( bv0 && bv1 && bv2 )
00549                         return false;
00550         }
00551         
00552         //if we get out here, it's unique
00553         return true;
00554 }

00556 
00558 // Build()
00559 //
00560 // Builds a strip forward as far as we can go, then builds backwards, and joins the two lists
00561 //
00562 void NvStripInfo::Build( NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos, NvFaceInfoVec &faceInfos )
00563 {
00564         // used in building the strips forward and backward
00565         WordVec scratchIndices;
00566         
00567         // build forward... start with the initial face
00568         NvFaceInfoVec forwardFaces, backwardFaces;
00569         forwardFaces.push_back( m_startInfo.m_startFace );
00570 
00571         MarkTriangle( m_startInfo.m_startFace );
00572         
00573         int v0 = ( m_startInfo.m_toV1 ? m_startInfo.m_startEdge->m_v0 : m_startInfo.m_startEdge->m_v1 );
00574         int v1 = ( m_startInfo.m_toV1 ? m_startInfo.m_startEdge->m_v1 : m_startInfo.m_startEdge->m_v0 );
00575         
00576         // easiest way to get v2 is to use this function which requires the
00577         // other indices to already be in the list.
00578         scratchIndices.push_back( v0 );
00579         scratchIndices.push_back( v1 );
00580         int v2 = NvStripifier::GetNextIndex( scratchIndices, m_startInfo.m_startFace );
00581         scratchIndices.push_back( v2 );
00582 
00583         //
00584         // build the forward list
00585         //
00586         int nv0 = v1;
00587         int nv1 = v2;
00588 
00589         NvFaceInfo *nextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, nv0, nv1, m_startInfo.m_startFace );
00590         while ( nextFace != NULL && !IsMarked( nextFace ) )
00591         {
00592                 //check to see if this next face is going to cause us to die soon
00593                 int testnv0 = nv1;
00594                 int testnv1 = NvStripifier::GetNextIndex( scratchIndices, nextFace );
00595                 
00596                 NvFaceInfo* nextNextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, testnv0, testnv1, nextFace );
00597 
00598                 if( ( nextNextFace == NULL ) || ( IsMarked( nextNextFace ) ) )
00599                 {
00600                         //uh, oh, we're following a dead end, try swapping
00601                         NvFaceInfo* testNextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, nv0, testnv1, nextFace );
00602 
00603                         if( ( ( testNextFace != NULL ) && !IsMarked( testNextFace ) ) )
00604                         {
00605                                 //we only swap if it buys us something
00606                                 
00607                                 //add a "fake" degenerate face
00608                                 NvFaceInfo* tempFace = new NvFaceInfo( nv0, nv1, nv0, true );
00609                                 
00610                                 forwardFaces.push_back( tempFace );
00611                                 MarkTriangle( tempFace );
00612 
00613                                 scratchIndices.push_back( nv0 );
00614                                 testnv0 = nv0;
00615 
00616                                 ++m_numDegenerates;
00617                         }
00618 
00619                 }
00620 
00621                 // add this to the strip
00622                 forwardFaces.push_back( nextFace );
00623 
00624                 MarkTriangle( nextFace );
00625                 
00626                 // add the index
00627                 //nv0 = nv1;
00628                 //nv1 = NvStripifier::GetNextIndex( scratchIndices, nextFace );
00629                 scratchIndices.push_back( testnv1 );
00630                 
00631                 // and get the next face
00632                 nv0 = testnv0;
00633                 nv1 = testnv1;
00634 
00635                 nextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, nv0, nv1, nextFace );
00636         
00637         }
00638         
00639         // tempAllFaces is going to be forwardFaces + backwardFaces
00640         // it's used for Unique()
00641         NvFaceInfoVec tempAllFaces;
00642         for( int i = 0; i < forwardFaces.size(); i++ )
00643                 tempAllFaces.push_back( forwardFaces[ i ] );
00644 
00645         //
00646         // reset the indices for building the strip backwards and do so
00647         //
00648         scratchIndices.resize( 0 );
00649         scratchIndices.push_back( v2 );
00650         scratchIndices.push_back( v1 );
00651         scratchIndices.push_back( v0 );
00652         nv0 = v1;
00653         nv1 = v0;
00654         nextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, nv0, nv1, m_startInfo.m_startFace );
00655         while ( nextFace != NULL && !IsMarked( nextFace ) )
00656         {
00657                 //this tests to see if a face is "unique", meaning that its vertices aren't already in the list
00658                 // so, strips which "wrap-around" are not allowed
00659                 if( !Unique( tempAllFaces, nextFace ) )
00660                         break;
00661 
00662                 //check to see if this next face is going to cause us to die soon
00663                 int testnv0 = nv1;
00664                 int testnv1 = NvStripifier::GetNextIndex( scratchIndices, nextFace );
00665                 
00666                 NvFaceInfo* nextNextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, testnv0, testnv1, nextFace );
00667 
00668                 if( ( nextNextFace == NULL ) || ( IsMarked( nextNextFace ) ) )
00669                 {
00670                         //uh, oh, we're following a dead end, try swapping
00671                         NvFaceInfo* testNextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, nv0, testnv1, nextFace );
00672                         if( ( ( testNextFace != NULL ) && !IsMarked( testNextFace ) ) )
00673                         {
00674                                 //we only swap if it buys us something
00675                                 
00676                                 //add a "fake" degenerate face
00677                                 NvFaceInfo* tempFace = new NvFaceInfo( nv0, nv1, nv0, true );
00678 
00679                                 backwardFaces.push_back( tempFace );
00680                                 MarkTriangle( tempFace );
00681                                 scratchIndices.push_back( nv0 );
00682                                 testnv0 = nv0;
00683 
00684                                 ++m_numDegenerates;
00685                         }
00686                                 
00687                 }
00688 
00689                 // add this to the strip
00690                 backwardFaces.push_back( nextFace );
00691                 
00692                 //this is just so Unique() will work
00693                 tempAllFaces.push_back( nextFace );
00694 
00695                 MarkTriangle( nextFace );
00696                 
00697                 // add the index
00698                 //nv0 = nv1;
00699                 //nv1 = NvStripifier::GetNextIndex( scratchIndices, nextFace );
00700                 scratchIndices.push_back( testnv1 );
00701                 
00702                 // and get the next face
00703                 nv0 = testnv0;
00704                 nv1 = testnv1;
00705                 nextFace = NvStripifier::FindOtherFace( edgeInfos, nv0, nv1, nextFace );
00706         }
00707         
00708         // Combine the forward and backwards stripification lists and put into our own face vector
00709         Combine( forwardFaces, backwardFaces );
00710 }
00711 
00712 
00714 // Combine()
00715 //
00716 // Combines the two input face vectors and puts the result into m_faces
00717 //
00718 void NvStripInfo::Combine( const NvFaceInfoVec &forward, const NvFaceInfoVec &backward ){
00719         
00720         // add backward faces
00721         int numFaces = backward.size();
00722         int i = numFaces - 1;
00723         for ( ; i >= 0; i-- )
00724                 m_faces.push_back( backward[ i ] );
00725         
00726         // add forward faces
00727         numFaces = forward.size();
00728         for ( i = 0; i < numFaces; i++ )
00729                 m_faces.push_back( forward[ i ] );
00730 }
00731 
00732 
00734 // SharesEdge()
00735 //
00736 // Returns true if the input face and the current strip share an edge
00737 //
00738 bool NvStripInfo::SharesEdge( const NvFaceInfo* faceInfo, NvEdgeInfoVec &edgeInfos )
00739 {
00740         //check v0->v1 edge
00741         NvEdgeInfo* currEdge = NvStripifier::FindEdgeInfo( edgeInfos, faceInfo->m_v0, faceInfo->m_v1 );
00742         
00743         if( IsInStrip( currEdge->m_face0 ) || IsInStrip( currEdge->m_face1 ) )
00744                 return true;
00745         
00746         //check v1->v2 edge
00747         currEdge = NvStripifier::FindEdgeInfo( edgeInfos, faceInfo->m_v1, faceInfo->m_v2 );
00748         
00749         if( IsInStrip( currEdge->m_face0 ) || IsInStrip( currEdge->m_face1 ) )
00750                 return true;
00751         
00752         //check v2->v0 edge
00753         currEdge = NvStripifier::FindEdgeInfo( edgeInfos, faceInfo->m_v2, faceInfo->m_v0 );
00754         
00755         if( IsInStrip( currEdge->m_face0 ) || IsInStrip( currEdge->m_face1 ) )
00756                 return true;
00757         
00758         return false;
00759         
00760 }
00761 
00762 
00764 // CommitStrips()
00765 //
00766 // "Commits" the input strips by setting their m_experimentId to -1 and adding to the allStrips
00767 //  vector
00768 //
00769 void NvStripifier::CommitStrips( NvStripInfoVec &allStrips, const NvStripInfoVec &strips )
00770 {       
00771         // Iterate through strips
00772         int numStrips = strips.size();
00773         for ( int i = 0; i < numStrips; i++ ){
00774 
00775                 // Tell the strip that it is now real
00776                 NvStripInfo *strip = strips[ i ];
00777                 strip->m_experimentId = -1;
00778                 
00779                 // add to the list of real strips
00780                 allStrips.push_back( strip );
00781                 
00782                 // Iterate through the faces of the strip
00783                 // Tell the faces of the strip that they belong to a real strip now
00784                 const NvFaceInfoVec &faces = strips[ i ]->m_faces;
00785                 int numFaces = faces.size();
00786 
00787                 for ( int j = 0; j < numFaces; j++ )
00788                 {
00789                         strip->MarkTriangle( faces[ j ] );
00790                 }
00791         }
00792 }
00793 
00794 
00796 // FindTraversal()
00797 //
00798 // Finds the next face to start the next strip on.
00799 //
00800 bool NvStripifier::FindTraversal( NvFaceInfoVec &faceInfos,
00801                                                                  NvEdgeInfoVec    &edgeInfos,
00802                                                                  NvStripInfo      *strip,
00803                                                                  NvStripStartInfo &startInfo ){
00804         
00805         // if the strip was v0->v1 on the edge, then v1 will be a vertex in the next edge.
00806         int v = ( strip->m_startInfo.m_toV1 ? strip->m_startInfo.m_startEdge->m_v1 : strip->m_startInfo.m_startEdge->m_v0 );
00807         
00808         NvFaceInfo *untouchedFace = NULL;
00809         NvEdgeInfo *edgeIter      = edgeInfos[ v ];
00810         while ( edgeIter != NULL ){
00811                 NvFaceInfo *face0 = edgeIter->m_face0;
00812                 NvFaceInfo *face1 = edgeIter->m_face1;
00813                 if ( ( face0 != NULL && !strip->IsInStrip( face0 ) ) && face1 != NULL && !strip->IsMarked( face1 ) )
00814                 {
00815                         untouchedFace = face1;
00816                         break;
00817                 }
00818                 if ( ( face1 != NULL && !strip->IsInStrip( face1 ) ) && face0 != NULL && !strip->IsMarked( face0 ) ){
00819                         untouchedFace = face0;
00820                         break;
00821                 }
00822                 
00823                 // find the next edgeIter
00824                 edgeIter = ( edgeIter->m_v0 == v ? edgeIter->m_nextV0 : edgeIter->m_nextV1 );
00825         }
00826         
00827         startInfo.m_startFace = untouchedFace;
00828         startInfo.m_startEdge = edgeIter;
00829         if ( edgeIter != NULL )
00830         {
00831                 if( strip->SharesEdge( startInfo.m_startFace, edgeInfos ) )
00832                         startInfo.m_toV1 = ( edgeIter->m_v0 == v );  //note! used to be m_v1
00833                 else
00834                         startInfo.m_toV1 = ( edgeIter->m_v1 == v );
00835         }
00836         return ( startInfo.m_startFace != NULL );
00837 }
00838 
00839 
00841 // RemoveSmallStrips()
00842 //
00843 // allStrips is the whole strip vector...all small strips will be deleted from this list, to avoid leaking mem
00844 // allBigStrips is an out parameter which will contain all strips above minStripLength
00845 // faceList is an out parameter which will contain all faces which were removed from the striplist
00846 //
00847 void NvStripifier::RemoveSmallStrips( NvStripInfoVec& allStrips, NvStripInfoVec& allBigStrips, NvFaceInfoVec& faceList )
00848 {
00849         faceList.clear();
00850         allBigStrips.clear();  //make sure these are empty
00851         NvFaceInfoVec tempFaceList;
00852         
00853         for( int i = 0; i < allStrips.size(); i++ )
00854         {
00855                 if( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces.size() < minStripLength )
00856                 {
00857                         //strip is too small, add faces to faceList
00858                         for( int j = 0; j < allStrips[ i ]->m_faces.size(); j++ )
00859                                 tempFaceList.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ j ] );
00860                         
00861                         //and free memory
00862                         delete allStrips[ i ];
00863                 }
00864                 else
00865                 {
00866                         allBigStrips.push_back( allStrips[ i ] );
00867                 }
00868         }
00869         
00870         if( tempFaceList.size() )
00871         {
00872                 bool *bVisitedList = new bool[ tempFaceList.size() ];
00873                 MemSet( bVisitedList, 0, tempFaceList.size()*sizeof( bool ) );
00874                 
00875                 VertexCache* vcache = new VertexCache( cacheSize );
00876                 
00877                 int bestNumHits = -1;
00878                 int numHits;
00879                 int bestIndex;
00880                 
00881                 while( 1 )
00882                 {
00883                         bestNumHits = -1;
00884                         
00885                         //find best face to add next, given the current cache
00886                         for( int i = 0; i < tempFaceList.size(); i++ )
00887                         {
00888                                 if( bVisitedList[ i ] )
00889                                         continue;
00890                                 
00891                                 numHits = CalcNumHitsFace( vcache, tempFaceList[ i ] );
00892                                 if( numHits > bestNumHits )
00893                                 {
00894                                         bestNumHits = numHits;
00895                                         bestIndex = i;
00896                                 }
00897                         }
00898                         
00899                         if( bestNumHits == -1.0f )
00900                                 break;
00901                         bVisitedList[ bestIndex ] = true;
00902                         UpdateCacheFace( vcache, tempFaceList[ bestIndex ] );
00903                         faceList.push_back( tempFaceList[ bestIndex ] );
00904                 }
00905                 
00906                 delete vcache;
00907                 delete[] bVisitedList;
00908         }
00909 }
00910 
00911 
00913 // NextIsCW()
00914 //
00915 // Returns true if the next face should be ordered in CW fashion
00916 //
00917 bool NvStripifier::NextIsCW( const int numIndices )
00918 {
00919         return ( ( numIndices % 2 ) == 0 );
00920 }
00921 
00922 
00924 // IsCW()
00925 //
00926 // Returns true if the face is ordered in CW fashion
00927 //
00928 bool NvStripifier::IsCW( NvFaceInfo *faceInfo, int v0, int v1 )
00929 {
00930         if ( faceInfo->m_v0 == v0 )
00931                 return ( faceInfo->m_v1 == v1 );
00932         
00933         else if ( faceInfo->m_v1 == v0 )
00934                 return ( faceInfo->m_v2 == v1 );
00935         
00936         else 
00937                 return ( faceInfo->m_v0 == v1 );
00938         
00939         // shouldn't get here
00940         assert( 0 );
00941         return false;
00942 }
00943 
00944 bool NvStripifier::FaceContainsIndex( const NvFaceInfo& face, const unsigned int index )
00945 {
00946         return ( ( face.m_v0 == index ) || ( face.m_v1 == index ) || ( face.m_v2 == index ) );
00947 }
00948 
00949 bool NvStripifier::IsMoneyFace( const NvFaceInfo& face )
00950 {
00951         if( FaceContainsIndex( face, 800 ) &&
00952            FaceContainsIndex( face, 812 ) &&
00953            FaceContainsIndex( face, 731 ) )
00954            return true;
00955 
00956         return false;
00957 }
00958                                 
00960 // CreateStrips()
00961 //
00962 // Generates actual strips from the list-in-strip-order.
00963 //
00964 void NvStripifier::CreateStrips( const NvStripInfoVec& allStrips, IntVec& stripIndices, 
00965                                                                 const bool bStitchStrips, unsigned int& numSeparateStrips, 
00966                                                                 const bool bRestart, const unsigned int restartVal )
00967 {
00968         assert( numSeparateStrips == 0 );
00969 
00970         NvFaceInfo tLastFace( 0, 0, 0 );
00971         NvFaceInfo tPrevStripLastFace( 0, 0, 0 );
00972         int nStripCount = allStrips.size();
00973         assert( nStripCount > 0 );
00974 
00975         //we infer the cw/ccw ordering depending on the number of indices
00976         //this is screwed up by the fact that we insert -1s to denote changing strips
00977         //this is to account for that
00978         int accountForNegatives = 0;
00979 
00980         for ( int i = 0; i < nStripCount; i++ )
00981         {
00982                 NvStripInfo *strip = allStrips[ i ];
00983                 int nStripFaceCount = strip->m_faces.size();
00984                 assert( nStripFaceCount > 0 );
00985 
00986                 // Handle the first face in the strip
00987                 {
00988                         NvFaceInfo tFirstFace( strip->m_faces[ 0 ]->m_v0, strip->m_faces[ 0 ]->m_v1, strip->m_faces[ 0 ]->m_v2 );
00989 
00990                         // If there is a second face, reorder vertices such that the
00991                         // unique vertex is first
00992                         if ( nStripFaceCount > 1 )
00993                         {
00994                                 int nUnique = NvStripifier::GetUniqueVertexInB( strip->m_faces[ 1 ], &tFirstFace );
00995                                 if ( nUnique == tFirstFace.m_v1 )
00996                                 {
00997                                         SWAP( tFirstFace.m_v0, tFirstFace.m_v1 );
00998                                 }
00999                                 else if ( nUnique == tFirstFace.m_v2 )
01000                                 {
01001                                         SWAP( tFirstFace.m_v0, tFirstFace.m_v2 );
01002                                 }
01003 
01004                                 // If there is a third face, reorder vertices such that the
01005                                 // shared vertex is last
01006                                 if ( nStripFaceCount > 2 )
01007                                 {
01008                                         if( IsDegenerate( strip->m_faces[ 1 ] ) )
01009                                         {
01010                                                 int pivot = strip->m_faces[ 1 ]->m_v1;
01011                                                 if( tFirstFace.m_v1 == pivot )
01012                                                 {
01013                                                         SWAP( tFirstFace.m_v1, tFirstFace.m_v2 );
01014                                                 }
01015                                         }
01016                                         else
01017                                         {
01018                                                 int nShared0, nShared1;
01019                                                 GetSharedVertices( strip->m_faces[ 2 ], &tFirstFace, &nShared0, &nShared1 );
01020                                                 if ( ( nShared0 == tFirstFace.m_v1 ) && ( nShared1 == -1 ) )
01021                                                 {
01022                                                         SWAP( tFirstFace.m_v1, tFirstFace.m_v2 );
01023                                                 }
01024                                         }
01025                                 }
01026                         }
01027 
01028                         if( ( i == 0 ) || !bStitchStrips || bRestart )
01029                         {
01030                                 if( !IsCW( strip->m_faces[ 0 ], tFirstFace.m_v0, tFirstFace.m_v1 ) )
01031                                         stripIndices.push_back( tFirstFace.m_v0 );
01032                         }
01033                         else
01034                         {
01035                                 // Double tap the first in the new strip
01036                                 stripIndices.push_back( tFirstFace.m_v0 );
01037         
01038                                 // Check CW/CCW ordering
01039                                 if ( NextIsCW( stripIndices.size() - accountForNegatives ) != IsCW( strip->m_faces[ 0 ], tFirstFace.m_v0, tFirstFace.m_v1 ) )
01040                                 {
01041                                         stripIndices.push_back( tFirstFace.m_v0 );
01042                                 }
01043                         }
01044 
01045                         stripIndices.push_back( tFirstFace.m_v0 );
01046                         stripIndices.push_back( tFirstFace.m_v1 );
01047                         stripIndices.push_back( tFirstFace.m_v2 );
01048 
01049                         // Update last face info
01050                         tLastFace = tFirstFace;
01051                 }
01052 
01053                 for ( int j = 1; j < nStripFaceCount; j++ )
01054                 {
01055                         int nUnique = GetUniqueVertexInB( &tLastFace, strip->m_faces[ j ] );
01056                         if ( nUnique != -1 )
01057                         {
01058                                 stripIndices.push_back( nUnique );
01059 
01060                                 // Update last face info
01061                                 tLastFace.m_v0 = tLastFace.m_v1;
01062                                 tLastFace.m_v1 = tLastFace.m_v2;
01063                                 tLastFace.m_v2 = nUnique;
01064                         }
01065                         else
01066                         {
01067                                 //we've hit a degenerate
01068                                 stripIndices.push_back( strip->m_faces[ j ]->m_v2 );
01069                                 tLastFace.m_v0 = strip->m_faces[ j ]->m_v0;//tLastFace.m_v1;
01070                                 tLastFace.m_v1 = strip->m_faces[ j ]->m_v1;//tLastFace.m_v2;
01071                                 tLastFace.m_v2 = strip->m_faces[ j ]->m_v2;//tLastFace.m_v1;
01072 
01073                         }
01074                 }
01075 
01076                 // Double tap between strips.
01077                 if ( bStitchStrips && !bRestart ) 
01078                 {
01079                         if ( i != nStripCount - 1 )
01080                                 stripIndices.push_back( tLastFace.m_v2 );
01081                 } 
01082                 else if ( bRestart ) 
01083                 {
01084                         stripIndices.push_back( restartVal );
01085                 } 
01086                 else 
01087                 {
01088                         //-1 index indicates next strip
01089                         stripIndices.push_back( -1 );
01090                         accountForNegatives++;
01091                         numSeparateStrips++;
01092                 }
01093 
01094                 // Update last face info
01095                 tLastFace.m_v0 = tLastFace.m_v1;
01096                 tLastFace.m_v1 = tLastFace.m_v2;
01097                 tLastFace.m_v2 = tLastFace.m_v2;
01098         }
01099         
01100         if( bStitchStrips || bRestart )
01101                 numSeparateStrips = 1;
01102 }
01103 
01104 
01106 // Stripify()
01107 //
01108 //
01109 // in_indices are the input indices of the mesh to stripify
01110 // in_cacheSize is the target cache size 
01111 //
01112 void NvStripifier::Stripify( const WordVec &in_indices, const int in_cacheSize, 
01113                                                         const int in_minStripLength, const unsigned short maxIndex, 
01114                                                         NvStripInfoVec &outStrips, NvFaceInfoVec& outFaceList )
01115 {
01116         meshJump = 0.0f;
01117         bFirstTimeResetPoint = true; //used in FindGoodResetPoint()
01118 
01119         //the number of times to run the experiments
01120         int numSamples = 10;
01121         
01122         //the cache size, clamped to one
01123         cacheSize = Max< int > ( 1, in_cacheSize - CACHE_INEFFICIENCY );
01124         
01125         minStripLength = in_minStripLength;  //this is the strip size threshold below which we dump the strip into a list
01126         
01127         indices = in_indices;
01128         
01129         // build the stripification info
01130         NvFaceInfoVec allFaceInfos;
01131         NvEdgeInfoVec allEdgeInfos;
01132         
01133         BuildStripifyInfo( allFaceInfos, allEdgeInfos, maxIndex );
01134         
01135         NvStripInfoVec allStrips;
01136 
01137         // stripify
01138         FindAllStrips( allStrips, allFaceInfos, allEdgeInfos, numSamples );
01139 
01140         //split up the strips into cache friendly pieces, optimize them, then dump these into outStrips
01141         SplitUpStripsAndOptimize( allStrips, outStrips, allEdgeInfos, outFaceList );
01142 
01143         //clean up
01144         int i = 0;
01145         for( ; i < allStrips.size(); i++ )
01146         {
01147                 delete allStrips[ i ];
01148         }
01149         
01150         for ( i = 0; i < allEdgeInfos.size(); i++ )
01151         {
01152                 NvEdgeInfo *info = allEdgeInfos[ i ];
01153                 while ( info != NULL )
01154                 {
01155                         NvEdgeInfo *next = ( info->m_v0 == i ? info->m_nextV0 : info->m_nextV1 );
01156                         info->Unref();
01157                         info = next;
01158                 }
01159         }
01160         
01161 }
01162 
01163 
01164 bool NvStripifier::IsDegenerate( const NvFaceInfo* face )
01165 {
01166         if( face->m_v0 == face->m_v1 )
01167                 return true;
01168         else if( face->m_v0 == face->m_v2 )
01169                 return true;
01170         else if( face->m_v1 == face->m_v2 )
01171                 return true;
01172         else
01173                 return false;
01174 }
01175 
01176 bool NvStripifier::IsDegenerate( const unsigned short v0, const unsigned short v1, const unsigned short v2 )
01177 {
01178         if( v0 == v1 )
01179                 return true;
01180         else if( v0 == v2 )
01181                 return true;
01182         else if( v1 == v2 )
01183                 return true;
01184         else
01185                 return false;
01186 }
01187 
01189 // SplitUpStripsAndOptimize()
01190 //
01191 // Splits the input vector of strips ( allBigStrips ) into smaller, cache friendly pieces, then
01192 //  reorders these pieces to maximize cache hits
01193 // The final strips are output through outStrips
01194 //
01195 void NvStripifier::SplitUpStripsAndOptimize( NvStripInfoVec &allStrips, NvStripInfoVec &outStrips,
01196                                             NvEdgeInfoVec& edgeInfos, NvFaceInfoVec& outFaceList )
01197 {
01198         int threshold = cacheSize;
01199         NvStripInfoVec tempStrips;
01200         
01201         //split up strips into threshold-sized pieces
01202         int i = 0;
01203         for( ; i < allStrips.size(); i++ )
01204         {
01205                 NvStripInfo* currentStrip;
01206                 NvStripStartInfo startInfo( NULL, NULL, false );
01207         
01208                 int actualStripSize = 0;
01209                 for( int j = 0; j < allStrips[ i ]->m_faces.size(); ++j )
01210                 {
01211                         if( !IsDegenerate( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ j ] ) )
01212                                 actualStripSize++;
01213                 }
01214                 
01215                 if( actualStripSize /*allStrips[ i ]->m_faces.size()*/ > threshold )
01216                 {
01217                         
01218                         int numTimes    = actualStripSize /*allStrips[ i ]->m_faces.size()*/ / threshold;
01219                         int numLeftover = actualStripSize /*allStrips[ i ]->m_faces.size()*/ % threshold;
01220 
01221                         int degenerateCount = 0;
01222                         int j = 0;
01223                         for( ; j < numTimes; j++ )
01224                         {
01225                                 currentStrip = new NvStripInfo( startInfo, 0, -1 );
01226                                 
01227                                 int faceCtr = j*threshold + degenerateCount;
01228                                 bool bFirstTime = true;
01229                                 while( faceCtr < threshold+( j*threshold )+degenerateCount )
01230                                 {
01231                                         if( IsDegenerate( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr ] ) )
01232                                         {
01233                                                 degenerateCount++;
01234                                                 
01235                                                 //last time or first time through, no need for a degenerate
01236                                                 if( ( ( ( faceCtr + 1 ) != threshold+( j*threshold )+degenerateCount ) ||
01237                                                          ( ( j == numTimes - 1 ) && ( numLeftover < 4 ) && ( numLeftover > 0 ) ) ) && 
01238                                                          !bFirstTime )
01239                                                 {
01240                                                         currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr++ ] );
01241                                                 }
01242                                                 else
01243                                                 {
01244                                                         //but, we do need to delete the degenerate, if it's marked fake, to avoid leaking
01245                                                         if( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr ]->m_bIsFake )
01246                                                         {
01247                                                                 delete allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr ], allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr ] = NULL;
01248                                                         }
01249                                                         ++faceCtr;
01250                                                 }
01251                                         }
01252                                         else
01253                                         {
01254                                                 currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr++ ] );
01255                                                 bFirstTime = false;
01256                                         }
01257                                 }
01258                                 /*
01259                                 for( int faceCtr = j*threshold; faceCtr < threshold+( j*threshold ); faceCtr++ )
01260                                 {
01261                                         currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr ] );
01262                                 }
01263                                 */
01264                                 if( j == numTimes - 1 ) //last time through
01265                                 {
01266                                         if( ( numLeftover < 4 ) && ( numLeftover > 0 ) ) //way too small
01267                                         {
01268                                                 //just add to last strip
01269                                                 int ctr = 0;
01270                                                 while( ctr < numLeftover )
01271                                                 {
01272                                                         IsDegenerate( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr ] ) ? ++degenerateCount : ++ctr;
01273                                                         currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ faceCtr++ ] );
01274                                                 }
01275                                                 numLeftover = 0;
01276                                         }
01277                                 }
01278                                 tempStrips.push_back( currentStrip );
01279                         }
01280                         
01281                         int leftOff = j * threshold + degenerateCount;
01282                         
01283                         if( numLeftover != 0 )
01284                         {
01285                                 currentStrip = new NvStripInfo( startInfo, 0, -1 );   
01286                                 
01287                                 int ctr = 0;
01288                                 bool bFirstTime = true;
01289                                 while( ctr < numLeftover )
01290                                 {
01291                                         if( !IsDegenerate( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ leftOff ] ) )
01292                                         {
01293                                                 ctr++;
01294                                                 bFirstTime = false;
01295                                                 currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ leftOff++ ] );
01296                                         }
01297                                         else if( !bFirstTime )
01298                                                 currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ leftOff++ ] );
01299                                         else
01300                                         {
01301                                                 //don't leak
01302                                                 if( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ leftOff ]->m_bIsFake )
01303                                                 {
01304                                                         delete allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ leftOff ], allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ leftOff ] = NULL;
01305                                                 }
01306 
01307                                                 leftOff++;
01308                                         }
01309                                 }
01310                                 /*
01311                                 for( int k = 0; k < numLeftover; k++ )
01312                                 {
01313                                         currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ leftOff++ ] );
01314                                 }
01315                                 */
01316                                 
01317                                 tempStrips.push_back( currentStrip );
01318                         }
01319                 }
01320                 else
01321                 {
01322                         //we're not just doing a tempStrips.push_back( allBigStrips[ i ] ) because
01323                         // this way we can delete allBigStrips later to free the memory
01324                         currentStrip = new NvStripInfo( startInfo, 0, -1 );
01325                         
01326                         for( int j = 0; j < allStrips[ i ]->m_faces.size(); j++ )
01327                                 currentStrip->m_faces.push_back( allStrips[ i ]->m_faces[ j ] );
01328                         
01329                         tempStrips.push_back( currentStrip );
01330                 }
01331         }
01332 
01333         //add small strips to face list
01334         NvStripInfoVec tempStrips2;
01335         RemoveSmallStrips( tempStrips, tempStrips2, outFaceList );
01336         
01337         outStrips.clear();
01338         //screw optimization for now
01339 //      for( i = 0; i < tempStrips.size(); ++i )
01340 //    outStrips.push_back( tempStrips[ i ] );
01341         
01342         if( tempStrips2.size() != 0 )
01343         {
01344                 //Optimize for the vertex cache
01345                 VertexCache* vcache = new VertexCache( cacheSize );
01346                 
01347                 float bestNumHits = -1.0f;
01348                 float numHits;
01349                 int bestIndex;
01350                 bool done = false;
01351                 
01352                 int firstIndex = 0;
01353                 float minCost = 10000.0f;
01354                 
01355                 for( i = 0; i < tempStrips2.size(); i++ )
01356                 {
01357                         int numNeighbors = 0;
01358                         
01359                         //find strip with least number of neighbors per face
01360                         for( int j = 0; j < tempStrips2[ i ]->m_faces.size(); j++ )
01361                         {
01362                                 numNeighbors += NumNeighbors( tempStrips2[ i ]->m_faces[ j ], edgeInfos );
01363                         }
01364                         
01365                         float currCost = ( float )numNeighbors / ( float )tempStrips2[ i ]->m_faces.size();
01366                         if( currCost < minCost )
01367                         {
01368                                 minCost = currCost;
01369                                 firstIndex = i;
01370                         }
01371                 }
01372                 
01373                 UpdateCacheStrip( vcache, tempStrips2[ firstIndex ] );
01374                 outStrips.push_back( tempStrips2[ firstIndex ] );
01375                 
01376                 tempStrips2[ firstIndex ]->visited = true;
01377                 
01378                 bool bWantsCW = ( tempStrips2[ firstIndex ]->m_faces.size() % 2 ) == 0;
01379 
01380                 //this n^2 algo is what slows down stripification so much....
01381                 // needs to be improved
01382                 while( 1 )
01383                 {
01384                         bestNumHits = -1.0f;
01385                         
01386                         //find best strip to add next, given the current cache
01387                         for( int i = 0; i < tempStrips2.size(); i++ )
01388                         {
01389                                 if( tempStrips2[ i ]->visited )
01390                                         continue;
01391 
01392                                 numHits = CalcNumHitsStrip( vcache, tempStrips2[ i ] );
01393                                 if( numHits > bestNumHits )
01394                                 {
01395                                         bestNumHits = numHits;
01396                                         bestIndex = i;
01397                                 }
01398                                 else if( numHits >= bestNumHits )
01399                                 {
01400                                         //check previous strip to see if this one requires it to switch polarity
01401                                         NvStripInfo *strip = tempStrips2[ i ];
01402                                         int nStripFaceCount = strip->m_faces.size();
01403                                         
01404                                         NvFaceInfo tFirstFace( strip->m_faces[ 0 ]->m_v0, strip->m_faces[ 0 ]->m_v1, strip->m_faces[ 0 ]->m_v2 );
01405                                         
01406                                         // If there is a second face, reorder vertices such that the
01407                                         // unique vertex is first
01408                                         if ( nStripFaceCount > 1 )
01409                                         {
01410                                                 int nUnique = NvStripifier::GetUniqueVertexInB( strip->m_faces[ 1 ], &tFirstFace );
01411                                                 if ( nUnique == tFirstFace.m_v1 )
01412                                                 {
01413                                                         SWAP( tFirstFace.m_v0, tFirstFace.m_v1 );
01414                                                 }
01415                                                 else if ( nUnique == tFirstFace.m_v2 )
01416                                                 {
01417                                                         SWAP( tFirstFace.m_v0, tFirstFace.m_v2 );
01418                                                 }
01419                                                 
01420                                                 // If there is a third face, reorder vertices such that the
01421                                                 // shared vertex is last
01422                                                 if ( nStripFaceCount > 2 )
01423                                                 {
01424                                                         int nShared0, nShared1;
01425                                                         GetSharedVertices( strip->m_faces[ 2 ], &tFirstFace, &nShared0, &nShared1 );
01426                                                         if ( ( nShared0 == tFirstFace.m_v1 ) && ( nShared1 == -1 ) )
01427                                                         {
01428                                                                 SWAP( tFirstFace.m_v1, tFirstFace.m_v2 );
01429                                                         }
01430                                                 }
01431                                         }
01432                                                 
01433                                         // Check CW/CCW ordering
01434                                         if ( bWantsCW == IsCW( strip->m_faces[ 0 ], tFirstFace.m_v0, tFirstFace.m_v1 ) )
01435                                         {
01436                                                 //I like this one!
01437                                                 bestIndex = i;
01438                                         }
01439                                 }
01440                         }
01441                         
01442                         if( bestNumHits == -1.0f )
01443                                 break;
01444                         tempStrips2[ bestIndex ]->visited = true;
01445                         UpdateCacheStrip( vcache, tempStrips2[ bestIndex ] );
01446                         outStrips.push_back( tempStrips2[ bestIndex ] );
01447                         bWantsCW = ( tempStrips2[ bestIndex ]->m_faces.size() % 2 == 0 ) ? bWantsCW : !bWantsCW;
01448                 }
01449                 
01450                 delete vcache;  
01451         }
01452 }
01453 
01454 
01456 // UpdateCacheStrip()
01457 //
01458 // Updates the input vertex cache with this strip's vertices
01459 //
01460 void NvStripifier::UpdateCacheStrip( VertexCache* vcache, NvStripInfo* strip )
01461 {
01462         for( int i = 0; i < strip->m_faces.size(); ++i )
01463         {
01464                 if( !vcache->InCache( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v0 ) )
01465                         vcache->AddEntry( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v0 );
01466                 
01467                 if( !vcache->InCache( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v1 ) )
01468                         vcache->AddEntry( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v1 );
01469                 
01470                 if( !vcache->InCache( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v2 ) )
01471                         vcache->AddEntry( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v2 );
01472         }
01473 }
01474 
01476 // UpdateCacheFace()
01477 //
01478 // Updates the input vertex cache with this face's vertices
01479 //
01480 void NvStripifier::UpdateCacheFace( VertexCache* vcache, NvFaceInfo* face )
01481 {
01482         if( !vcache->InCache( face->m_v0 ) )
01483                 vcache->AddEntry( face->m_v0 );
01484                 
01485         if( !vcache->InCache( face->m_v1 ) )
01486                 vcache->AddEntry( face->m_v1 );
01487                 
01488         if( !vcache->InCache( face->m_v2 ) )
01489                 vcache->AddEntry( face->m_v2 );
01490 }
01491 
01492 
01494 // CalcNumHitsStrip()
01495 //
01496 // returns the number of cache hits per face in the strip
01497 //
01498 float NvStripifier::CalcNumHitsStrip( VertexCache* vcache, NvStripInfo* strip )
01499 {
01500         int numHits = 0;
01501         int numFaces = 0;
01502         
01503         for( int i = 0; i < strip->m_faces.size(); i++ )
01504         {
01505                 if( vcache->InCache( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v0 ) )
01506                         ++numHits;
01507                 
01508                 if( vcache->InCache( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v1 ) )
01509                         ++numHits;
01510                 
01511                 if( vcache->InCache( strip->m_faces[ i ]->m_v2 ) )
01512                         ++numHits;
01513                 
01514                 numFaces++;
01515         }
01516         
01517         return ( ( float )numHits / ( float )numFaces );
01518 }
01519 
01520 
01522 // CalcNumHitsFace()
01523 //
01524 // returns the number of cache hits in the face
01525 //
01526 int NvStripifier::CalcNumHitsFace( VertexCache* vcache, NvFaceInfo* face )
01527 {
01528         int numHits = 0;
01529 
01530         if( vcache->InCache( face->m_v0 ) )
01531                 numHits++;
01532                 
01533         if( vcache->InCache( face->m_v1 ) )
01534                 numHits++;
01535                 
01536         if( vcache->InCache( face->m_v2 ) )
01537                 numHits++;
01538                 
01539         return numHits;
01540 }
01541 
01542 
01544 // NumNeighbors()
01545 //
01546 // Returns the number of neighbors that this face has
01547 //
01548 int NvStripifier::NumNeighbors( NvFaceInfo* face, NvEdgeInfoVec& edgeInfoVec )
01549 {
01550         int numNeighbors = 0;
01551         
01552         if( FindOtherFace( edgeInfoVec, face->m_v0, face->m_v1, face ) != NULL )
01553         {
01554                 numNeighbors++;
01555         }
01556         
01557         if( FindOtherFace( edgeInfoVec, face->m_v1, face->m_v2, face ) != NULL )
01558         {
01559                 numNeighbors++;
01560         }
01561         
01562         if( FindOtherFace( edgeInfoVec, face->m_v2, face->m_v0, face ) != NULL )
01563         {
01564                 numNeighbors++;
01565         }
01566         
01567         return numNeighbors;
01568 }
